sentence.Network_en: People's lifestyles are usually fixed by generational habits and fashions.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们的生活方式通常取决于那一代的生活习惯和流行时尚。

sentence.Network_en: New fashions took a long time to percolate down.
sentence.Network_cn: 新时尚要很长时间才能在大众中流行起来。

sentence.Network_en: They clothe their children in the latest fashions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们给他们的孩子穿最时髦的服装。

女性时尚（women's fashion）(Women's fashion) ，简单地说，顾名思义，女性时尚（women's fashion）就是“女性”与“时尚”的相加。在这个极简化的意义上，也就是短时间内 …

entry.def: Fashion is the area of activity that involves styles of clothing and appearance.

example.ex: There are 20 full-colour pages of fashion for men...
example.tran: 书中有 20 张有关男性时尚的彩色插页。

example.ex: The fashion world does not mind what the real world thinks.
example.tran: 时尚界并不在意现实世界的想法。

entry.def: A fashion is a style of clothing or a way of behaving that is popular at a particular time.

example.ex: In the early seventies I wore false eyelashes, as was the fashion...
example.tran: 70 年代初我戴假睫毛，这在当时是时尚。

example.ex: Queen Mary started the fashion for blue and white china in England...
example.tran: 玛丽女王开启了青花瓷在英格兰的流行风尚。

entry.def: If you do something in a particular fashion or after a particular fashion, you do it in that way.

example.ex: There is another drug called DHE that works in a similar fashion...
example.tran: 另外还有一种叫 DHE 的药物，药效也差不多。

example.ex: It is happening in this fashion because of the obstinacy of one woman.
example.tran: 事情会如此发展是因为一个女人的固执己见。

entry.def: If you fashion an object or a work of art, you make it.

example.ex: Stone Age settlers fashioned necklaces from sheep's teeth.
example.tran: 石器时代的移居者用羊的牙做成项链。

entry.def: If you say that something was done after a fashion, you mean that it was done, but not very well.

example.ex: She was educated — after a fashion — at home...
example.tran: 她算得上是受过教育——家庭教育。

example.ex: He knew the way, after a fashion.

entry.def: If something is in fashion, it is popular and approved of at a particular time. If it is out of fashion, it is not popular or approved of.

example.ex: That sort of house is back in fashion...
example.tran: 那种房子又时兴起来了。

example.ex: Marriage seems to be going out of fashion.

means.word_mean: 1. consumer goods (especially clothing) in the current mode
